fields.infoText:
You can avoid financial penalties by making sure we get your completed return and payment on account by the due date.

If you give incomplete or inaccurate information, we may charge a financial penalty or even prosecute you.

By accepting, you declare that the information that you have provided is true and complete.

fields.label: Provide details below of who is signing the declaration
First name
fields.errorMessage: First name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: Last name
fields.errorMessage: Last name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: Status
fields.helpText: For example, director, financial controller or secretary
fields.errorMessage: Position in the company can only include letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: To receive confirmation that your return has been submitted, enter an email address below
Email address (optional)
fields.errorMessage: Enter a valid email address with no spaces, like name@example.com

fields.label: Payment
fields.infoText:
If you have already set up a Direct Debit for this tax, you donâ€™t need to do anything else. Your payment will be collected automatically from your bank.

Otherwise, paying electronically, such as BACS, CHAPS or Faster Payments, is an easy and secure way to pay. Make sure to include your 15 digit registration number on any payment.

Sort code: 08-32-00

Account name: HMRC GACA
